item.title: How evil a comma could be in Python
item.author: Chao
item.description: How bad a comma could be in Python? Though I have been using Python for a couple of years, mainly as a utility to help develop software, I am still surprised by Python from time to time. Sometimes is the Sytanx sugar making me realise how elegant a Python code could be, sometimes is the caveat annoying me. Here is the story, in the beginning, I had a code like the one below (for the demo purpose, I simplify the code here):
